scenario_text.value: Keep it up, Lopmon!
I will! Just watch me, Shuuji!

Why... Why are you doing this?! There’s no
value in protecting humans!

And what do you know about Shuuji?! You have
no clue how special he is to me!

Thank you, Lopmon. I’ll do what I can to live
up to your faith!

Shuuji—no, all humans are important! I want
to protect everyone!

Yeah, I feel the same. Let’s do it! We’ll
protect our friends!

Value has nothing to do with it. I just want
to protect Shuuji—protect everyone!

Thank you, Lopmon. I’m in, too. For you, and
for our friends!
Keep it up, Lopmon!
I will! Just watch me, Shuuji!

Why... Why are you doing this?! There’s no
value in protecting humans!

And what do you know about Shuuji?! You have
no clue how special he is to me!

Thank you, Lopmon. I’ll do what I can to live
up to your faith!

Shuuji—no, all humans are important! I want
to protect everyone!

Yeah, I feel the same. Let’s do it! We’ll
protect our friends!

Value has nothing to do with it. I just want
to protect Shuuji—protect everyone!

Thank you, Lopmon. I’m in, too. For you, and
for our friends!
You can do it, Turuiemon!
Yeah! Just watch me, Shuuji!

Why... Why are you doing this?! There’s no
value in protecting humans!

And what do you know about Shuuji?! You have
no clue how special he is to me!

Thank you, Turuiemon. I’ll do what I can to
live up to your faith!

Shuuji—no, all humans are important! I want
to protect everyone!

Yeah, I feel the same. Let’s do it! We’ll
protect our friends!

I just want to protect Shuuji—protect
everyone!

Thank you, Turuiemon. I’m in, too. For you,
and for our friends!
Keep it up, Andiramon!
I’ll bring you victory, Shuuji.

Why... Why are you doing this?! There’s no
value in protecting humans!

What does a guy like you know about Shuuji?
He’s my fated child, and that’s that.

Thank you, Andiramon. I’ll do what I can to
live up to your faith!

Shuuji—no, all humans are priceless! I will
protect them all!

Yeah, I feel the same. Let’s do it! We’ll
protect our friends!

All this talk of value... You fool. I just
want to protect Shuuji—to protect everyone.

Thank you, Andiramon. I’m in, too. For you,
and for our friends!

Damn it all... Don’t expect me to follow your
foul logic!
